title: Elementalist Lux form art
body:
Does anyone know where I can find the full art for the other forms of Elementalist Lux in the RiotGames folder?
I can only find the the light form in the skin folder.

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.232\deploy\assets\images\champions

replies.body: As others have stated, there is only one splash art, not 10, so you'd only be able to locate Light form's asset.
because those are only for the in-game HUD
so where in the league folder can i find the HUD ones?

> [{quoted}](name=LordoftheScarf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=B1FpvNE2,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-30T03:06:33.314+0000)
>
> so where in the league folder can i find the HUD ones?

the other forms don't have their own splash, they only have character portraits for when you transform from Light Lux
That's because you cannot. Only Light form has a splash art, none of the others do. The others only have a character portraits.
